subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Lakers’ Kobe Bryant scored 17 points, all in the second half, but the Hornets held on for a victory to even the best-of-seven series at two games apiece.
snippet: The Lakers’ Kobe Bryant scored 17 points, all in the second half, but the Hornets held on for a victory to even the best-of-seven series at two games apiece.
